attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the "Movement for Democratic Change" has withdrawn from the elections due to violence, it is more important than ever that action is taken now to ensure Zimbabwe has a future in which it can prosper.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=zimbabwe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=resign&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
